summary: Completed testing of LedgerOS iteration 2 features. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate). Most frontend features working including ledger card clicks, search, and navigation. Found some UI issues with modal interactions and incomplete light theme implementation.

ui_bugs.issue: Edit dialog fails to open due to timeout/overlay interception
Modal overlays intercepting pointer events preventing clicks

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete edit flow due to dialog not opening

design_issues.issue: Dark theme elements still present despite light theme requirement

console_errors.message: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string

passed_tests: Backend API authentication and login (100% success rate)
Ledger card clickable functionality - opens side panel with transactions
Search functionality in transactions page (filtered 25 UPI transactions)
Navigation between Dashboard, Transactions, Ledgers pages
Loan interest calculation API endpoint working correctly
Transaction edit and delete buttons present and visible
Bulk tagging UI elements (checkboxes and bulk tag button)
Light theme mostly applied (page background: rgb(248, 250, 252))
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issues preventing transaction edit dialog from opening. Complete light theme implementation by removing dark backgrounds from navigation and buttons. Resolve React Select.Item value prop warnings.
